channel.title: Banned tag
channel.description: Well just recently, someone posted in the general discussion board of a member that he had thought didn't get a punishment for posting malware. I think it would be useful to at least have a Banned tag under the name to show that the user is banned.. Not really needed, but it does help find out if someone is banned or not.

item.title: Banned tag
item.dc:creator: @tinyscape TinyScape
item.description:
@tinyscape wrote:

Aright then, was worth the try

Read full topic

item.title: Banned tag
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

Newty:

It could be helpful in certain situations but in all honestly it really isn’t needed. Whether the general public knows if a member is banned or not really doesn’t matter because regardless of who can see the ban, he is still banned in the end.

This. We also have specific reasons why we ban members. Those reasons are intended to keep private, as well as the fact the member is banned. More than once we have done bans on request for personal reasons. We don’t want those people exposed for being banned to either prevent embarrassment or to keep people from receiving attention when being banned.

Read full topic
